DOC.brief_summary: Emerging evidence suggest vitamin D [ 25-hydroxyvitamin D ; 25 ( OH ) D ] may play role etiology type 2 diabetes . Vitamin D level low type 2 diabetes impair glucose tolerance ( IGT ) compare normal glucose tolerance ( NGT ) . In addition , prospective study show significant inverse association baseline serum 25 ( OH ) D incident diabetes . To date , however , exact mechanism vitamin D affect diabetes risk yet fully know , particularly whether vitamin D play role insulin resistance ( IR ) and/or b-cell dysfunction , main pathophysiological disorder underlie type 2 diabetes . So , investigator plan examine prospective association baseline vitamin D [ 25-hydroxyvitamin D ; 25 ( OH ) D ] insulin resistance ( IR ) , b-cell function , glucose homeostasis subject risk type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Inadequacy Associated With Incidence Type 2 Diabetes
